title: L.A. billboards target misconduct scandal ahead of Oscars
text:
L.A. billboards target misconduct scandal ahead of Oscars Wednesday, February 28, 2018 - 01:11 
Just days before the Academy Awards ceremony, three billboards in Hollywood were covered Wednesday with slogans blasting the entertainment industry over the recent sexual misconduct accusations. Colette Luke has more.
